titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I spent all the morning at a meeting of the Jarvis Trustees at Staunton–on–Wye: & then lunched with Sir John Cotterill. On my return, I sawed wood for an hour, & then was interviewed by the brothers Bulmer on the project of a "Reconstruction" Committee for the county.
